page.title: 10PILKINGTON GARDEN CENTRE.
page.content: Mr R.Brooks is the general manager at the centre. He has worked there for eight years though the place itself has been open for twenty-two years. There are eighteen employees and you dont need any qualifications to work there. They obtain their stocks from garden centres all over Britain and their biggest seller is plants. The centre is the biggest horticultural retailer in the area and they get most of their customers from within a ten-mile radius. It built up over the years and is still expanding. The hours of opening are eight to five-thirty and ten to five-thirty on Sundays. They get about four thousand customers a week and 65% of them are families. Mr Brooks is a keen gardener and keeps the centre in good condition.
